G

Game - Class in spaceArkanoid
Main Game class containing the game loop & display options
Game(JFrame) - Constructor for class spaceArkanoid.Game
Main Entry point for the game
GameEntity - Interface in spaceArkanoid.controller
Main interface for any GameEntity that is going to be rendered on screen
gameLoop() - Method in class spaceArkanoid.Game
Main Game loop Responsible for updating all entities then rendering them Inspired in part by (http://www.cokeandcode.com/info/showsrc/showsrc.php?
gameOver - Variable in class spaceArkanoid.service.State
If we're in game over state
gamePaused - Variable in class spaceArkanoid.service.State
if we're in paused state
gameRunning - Variable in class spaceArkanoid.Game
Whether or not we should update the loop
gameRunning() - Method in class spaceArkanoid.service.State
Convenience method to know if the game is running and if we should update the game loop
gameSplash - Variable in class spaceArkanoid.service.State
if we're in splash screen (start of the game)
getCanvas() - Method in class spaceArkanoid.service.State
Convenience function to get the game canvas
getEntities() - Method in class spaceArkanoid.service.State
 
getModel() - Method in class spaceArkanoid.controller.Raquette
 
getRaquette() - Method in class spaceArkanoid.service.State
 
getState() - Static method in class spaceArkanoid.service.State
